website_summaries.verdict: This stylish ceramic model is designed for use with succulents or small plants, such as culinary herbs.
pros: A decent size, but not too huge
comes with matching saucer to catch excess water
Users are pleased with its excellent quality
cons: No way to wall-mount it, so only suitable as an indoor window box, unless you have a wide outdoor ledge it can sit on

customer_reviews.title: It makes a nice centerpiece on my table
customer_reviews.text: So lovely. It makes a nice centerpiece on my table.
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateLover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I am really enjoying this planter. It's a great size for packing in a lot of succulents (see my pictures) and fits right under my bankers lamp for a great display. People always ask me about the planter. You cannot find it in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Enough space for my succulents
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now, and it is exactly what I needed for my succulents. There is plenty of room for a couple small plants, and the 2 drainage holes seem to be sufficient drainage for my plant.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean and modern
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my kitchen window (: My cat decided that he needed to eat my parsley that was living there, so I bought this little planter to grow catgrass for him instead. It's very sleek and a sturdy quality, doesn't feel cheap like I was expecting tbh. It could easily be used for weddings or table centerpieces as well as for a desk and office. The packaging was very well done, it was sealed in styrofoam inside its own box inside an Amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a beautiful white ceramic planter free of any defects for cost of almost $23.00. Instead I received a planter with more than four defects in the paint and glaze. The worst of the defects was "sanded" over to minimize the defect causing the shiny glaze to be dull in that area. I am extremely disappointed that this passed quality control for an Amazon Prime product. And I used my rewards to purchase it and am not sure if that can be credited back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Retired in MP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent planters.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a white oval or rectangular planter for months. It didn't occur to me to check Amazon - but I got desperate and thought I would check Amazon. I couldn't believe it when I saw these - they are PERFECT for my window sills. They are larger than they look, hold a lot of dirt and will allow for my plants to grow bigger. I like the saucer being there in case I over water the plants can drain a bit. They are well made and were packaged just great - very well done!
customer_reviews.author: Gwens Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cracks in Glaze After a Few Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very happy with this order. It's attractive and I appreciate a modern looking planter that includes a drainage tray. Unfortunately, after having it only a few weeks, there are crazing marks all over the piece. It really ruins the clean modern look of the piece. The planter has always been inside and I water the plants with room temperature water, so I can't imagine what would have caused this other than some defect in the glaze. It's too late for me to return it but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: i enjoyed it for several weeks before i found so many(10+) ...
customer_reviews.text: i enjoyed it for several weeks before i found so many(10+) cracks on both the planter and the saucer. it is of poor quality.. i am wondering how long it can last..
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this (bought a pair). They were smaller than I realized (I didn’t pay attention to the listed dimensions) but they still look really nice. They’re of enough weight that I feel like they will last and the drip tray is important. I haven’t used them long enough to determine if the drip tray will leach moisture yet. (These are replacing another clay/glass pot that leached moisture despite a drip tray). I’m looking forward to decorating these with a vinyl design and the smooth texture will be perfect for that. I plan to buy more when I clear out another window space.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this little planter. I have two small aloe plants in it and they look very pretty. I love the turquoise color. It would go with a lot of different motifs. My color scheme is mostly light browns reds and blues and it fits in perfectly. It adds a Little Midwest flair while still being sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcgurk

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, cheaply made, but aesthetically pleasing from afar. This arrived with numerous chips in the paint, and ceramic, as seems to often be the case per other peoples' reviews. The paint also had numerous pock marks. The ceramic is extremely thin. This is not even worth half of the $22.50. For those unaware, this item is made in China. I have found ceramic pots much larger, and of superior quality for 1/3 of the price. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mellifluous

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and minimalist
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and minimalist. Made a little succulent/crystal garden as a housewarming gift for friends. (Link to stones bought as well:  )
customer_reviews.author: Madelynne Nehl

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The succulents in the photo look small and make the pot look smaller than it is, but I should have looked at the measurements. It's much bigger and I love it! It also came with a nice soft general purpose cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Got an aloe plant? Want to put into something snazzy?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an aloe vera plant my wife received as a gift. The plant rests in a window sill in our kitchen, and our appliances are black; so I hoped this would go well with the rest of the kitchen. It does. The black is very dark and glossy; perfect for a kitchen. The dimensions are perfect for the sill, and for the aloe plant. My wife is very pleased with the purchase, and for the price, it was a great value to me compared to some other online retailers and local brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Windham

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter for succulents
customer_reviews.text: I planted some cuttings from different succulents in this planter. It is a nice way to show off the plants. I think it's a little overpriced but the quality appears to be good
customer_reviews.author: chrystine d.

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 to put next to each other, I was really looking for 1 in turquoise that was anywhere from 15" to 20" to fit on a window sill. The color is beautiful, very much like shown in picture. However, remember they are ceramic so when you are trying to put 2 right next to each other, the tint might not match perfectly, mine are ever so slightly different, I am probably the only one that notices, so I kept them both.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fits window sill. Love
customer_reviews.text: Really love this. It is slightly taller than what I needed for succulents but I still like it. My plants have grown more and are able to spread out. One major thing I love is it still fits on a typical window sill!! Which is nice for plants that require bright light. Just pop it on the sill and then move it back.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Find!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful planter, but the plate came with a small chip. For the price, I would expect it to be in perfect condition, but it was nothing a similar colored sharpie couldn't fix! Packaging was appropriate with Styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: McHalf Mi.

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I repotted some succulents that had babies in here and it looks great. It's the perfect size and depth, and it looks really sleek. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Pane

customer_reviews.title: Great Planter!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a planter that would fit on my window sill and looked good. This planter was perfect. It's heavy weight ceramic planter with a separate detached bottom and the planter has 2 drainage holes, which was great! My succulents look great in it and I would definitely recommend this planter.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Low

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for some pathos vines in our home. They look great it in! The colors are complimentary and it provides a nice accent to our room. It was well made, we found no bubbles or cracks, the finish is nice, clean, and glossy. The drainage holes are a good size. The color is as pictured. A well made product. Update: I just bought a second one (; The first is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Capito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Succulents!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for making succulent arrangements and it's really clean and minimal, and good quality! Has drainage holes in the bottom as well as the little dish to catch any water, so it won't ruin your windowsill. I fill mine with mostly gravel, so I've never had an issue with succulents rotting due to excess moisture. So far, I've ordered two of them for myself and it makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: R Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great looking planters
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for succulent plants. So far have only used one. The saucer is essential to protect table top from drainage for other types of small plants. I have Seven succulent day plants in the yellow one and don’t expect to replant for a year! Color is great! Also bought one in teal which is great color .
customer_reviews.author: Retired Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for succulents
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. I have 4 with various succulents, and I have kept them alive for a while now :) This is my first attempt at keeping succulents. I am using cactus jack soil and then a top dressing of white marble and fluorite. One that I received did have a small scratch on top, but the other 3 were perfect. I think the drain holes help because the succulents in my containers without drain hold aren’t doing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa West Mautner

customer_reviews.title: Made of cheap ceramic but still looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks attractive, with semi-rounded corners and a high-gloss sheen. I appreciate that it comes with its own tray, and is a convenient size for a windowsill, mantle, or narrow shelf. It also arrived very safely packaged in a ton of styrofoam, though I felt guilty about having to throw that away. For the price I might wish it was made out of a better quality ceramic, but this isn't something that shows or affects its use.
customer_reviews.author: Verre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Vivid Red!
customer_reviews.text: This sets very nicely on my kitchen window sill with two small bonsai trees in it. I would say it’s a little pricey, but the color is beautiful, and it drains very well. The red color is beautiful, bright & vivid. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little pot
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little planter for my succulents! I was looking for a small, colorful pot with a draining tray for my office. I repotted my succulents in this with succulent soil, and it’s perfect! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sdb

customer_reviews.title: good value for money spent
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that the planter came with a matching saucer. Even though I used the planter for cacti which don't need much water, I still tend to over-water & I'm happy the saucer is there to protect my furniture. I planted 6 little cacti and this planter showcases them beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Despite taking note of the dimensions the pot was smaller than expected. Only fit two of the three succulents that I intended to pot. Build quality is excellent and the item has a heft that is indicative of quality ceramics! Only issue was with the base... due to the nature of ceramics the base wasn't perfectly square/flat and it teeters on the table top. This was remedied by adding felt feet to the bottom which also serve the purpose of preventing it from scratching the table top. All in all, it was a great purchase and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful planter. Very solid, perfect size for my requirement, arrived beautifully packaged. Nothing to complain about. Plus it has a perfectly fitting matching tray to catch any drips.
customer_reviews.author: MaMaMiko

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful planter for your home.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this planner. It fits perfectly in my house on a shelf. Heavy duty sturdy quality but not heavy to carry. Was packaged well and arrived quickly. It definitely add something to my room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Broshears

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is a gorgeous little pot. Couldn't find anything like it in stores, but it's what I had in my head. Arrived super quick in perfect condition. Think I'll order the 14" as well.
customer_reviews.author: shelbybee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Succulents
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product! I plan to put 6 succulents in it. Compared to other similar products on Amazon, this pot was much larger, which is what I wanted. The yellow is not a canary yellow, but it isn't pale, either. I was worried it was going to be a little to light. However, I was pleasantly surprised that it maintain a pop of vibrancy. I can't wait for my plants to get here. I ended up buying a second one in red because it was so great.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Nice for succulents
customer_reviews.text: I wish these came slightly bigger, but 10 inches is a pretty decent size. I like the drainage holes, and the black has a nice shiny finish. I put my succulent choices in there right away. I'll probably have to repot some once they grow larger.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cat Planter
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect rectangular planter, to grow grass for the cats because they're indoor cats. It's heavy enough not to push over and deep enough not to reach the dirt. Roary and Evie; cats names, are sooooo lucky.
customer_reviews.author: K.Vasoyan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a planter to fit on my fireplace mantle and this is just right. Very sturdy and thick-walled. I like that it has drainage holes and a matching drainage tray. The turquoise color is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: TrtleGrl

customer_reviews.title: Great Pots
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before in different colors so I know how good they really are. I would definitely buy these again and I recommend them to everyone who's looking for the perfect planter for cactus/succulents or any small plants,
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Mckeon

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat toy container!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for plants. I bought it for my cats’ toys. It’s perfect! It’s sturdy so they can’t tip it over and just the right size so they can get their toys out.
customer_reviews.author: Jito

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and arrived undamaged. It is the perfect size for a well lit end table or a window sill and might also look nice as a table centerpiece. It might also look good outdoors. I can't wait for my succulents to arrive today!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful planter!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and thoughtfully packaged. It's generous in size and heavy-duty. It's nicely glazed. It provides excellent drainage. The saucer fits perfectly. It's so much better than I had anticipated. I planted baby tears in mine and I think it looks lovely.
customer_reviews.author: OregoniansTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fun color, well made!
customer_reviews.text: Pots will add a wonderful touch of color, to the otherwise neutral colored pots, in my massive plant collection! Will likely use them for some pink or lilac colored violets or maybe for miniature privet hedges, that have been growing for years in clay pots. Whichever plants will be lucky enough to get these pots, they will certainly stand out! :) Pots are a good length and depth, appear well made and the saucer fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The Princess and the Pea

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged. It's a well made, heavy little planter. Good quality and value. My succulents look great in it. The sleek style goes with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: The tray doesn't really hold any water overflow, it's too small and fits too snugly...I still have to move plants to water
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted an indoor pot with a tray that I could water without moving it. Unfortunately, that doesn't work. The tray fits snugly around the pot which looks great, but doesn't offer much help with containing water drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Catlow

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Attractive Vehicle for Adding Flowers to Your Environment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add some annuals to my screened in porch, to give it some color. I bought four of these, put some mulch at the bottom for drainage, bought a few different plants and combined the colors in different ways. I'm getting such enjoyment from having blooming flowers all the time. And the colors look so attractive contrasted against the white container.
customer_reviews.author: HalKid2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This stunning turquoise planter is planted with my colorful moon cacti, and the display really pops out amidst more neutral tones. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: catsmom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Practical
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately you cannot see the 4 shiny, black container pots well in this picture BUT their size & shape were most advantageous. In this outdoor shower we had to work around posts AND pipes. They will maintain their shape and stay put in the wind...all while making the perfect backdrop for non-succulents.
customer_reviews.author: Kk Garry

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this little planter is rather overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this little planter is rather overpriced, but I couldn't find anything else like it for my succulents that I wanted to put on the windowsill. For a windowsill, it works out perfectly. I put two succulents in it. The yellow color is cheery and matches the rest of the warm colors in my kitchen. I just wish it was more affordable!
customer_reviews.author: MGM23

customer_reviews.title: Decorative planter
customer_reviews.text: High gloss red - and a shape that wasn't easy to find. Love it. Only problem for me was the drain holes with tray. They're rather large so tray could easily fill with water and overflow. Covered holes with duct tape and careful with watering - that works. Fits on mantle or other narrow spaces.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Came "new" with missing glaze and a poorly repaired crack
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for a replacement. Waste of time. If it comes again with glazing issues I will change the review to one star and ask for my money back. - - Just received the second one and I am going to leave this at 2 stars. The second pot came with a dent in the front (or back...) main face of the pot. Still the cheapest I could find this size with a tray so the mark will be facing a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea E. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ceramic Succulent Planter
customer_reviews.text: This is really a first class planter. The white ceramic is beautiful and it has two drain holes on the bottom for the tray. I purchased a flowering African tree that needs to be treated like a cactus. It is so happy in this planter with lots of room to expand its roots. Also is very well packaged for shipping. I could find nothing in town even close to this price. They all were 3 times more at least. Thank you Amazon!! I don't know why they included a special cloth to wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planter! I have succulents and a spikey aloe in mine, great quality, and love the drain hole and pan underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Guo

customer_reviews.title: paint runs
customer_reviews.text: one side looks ok, the other side has paint runs all over...would only suggest this item if one side is showing, and not as a centerpiece where the entire unit will be seen
customer_reviews.author: Steffan Howey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy, perfect for a mini garden of succulents
customer_reviews.text: I used this to combine all my succulents into one planter. This ended up fitting perfectly on my window sill which was a plus since I get very little light in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey G.

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love how this looks I love how the bottom is separated design is awesome my only complain I have is I wish it was more narrow so it would fit on though window sill in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ceramic Planter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made ceramic planter. Heavy and well glazed. Succulents will be beautiful in this planter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy color
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these in yellow for our kitchen window sills. The color is vibrant and lovely. Very sturdy and the bottom is separate. We planted basil in both of them Yes, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best succulent plant pots I have bought so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the best succulent plant pots I have bought so far! Wonderful for drainage and letting the succulent spread. It is a very deep pot, so the soil stays moist longer than most. Needs less watering.
customer_reviews.author: Summer England

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for succulents
customer_reviews.text: The planter was exactly as described and the packaging kept it safe during shipping. I was able to consolidate several of my succulents and it now fits perfectly on my kitchen window ledge. It has a clean look and I like that the basin can be detached for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: This simple, yet stunning ceramic pot make a beautiful statement. I'm not sure what I enjoy more, the plants or the pot. I appreciate the thoughtful planning that went into creating this pot, it looks so elegantly & naturally rich sitting in my kitchen window sill. If I'm to add more succulents to my home, this would be the pot of choice!
customer_reviews.author: Utilena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the pot overall, though the color coating was peeling off at some spots when it arrived. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pei-Ciao Tang

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! This is a sturdy, well-glazed ceramic planter. It is exactly the stated size. The turquoise color is lovely. The under-dish is very handy, too. I am putting this on my deep windowsill with grasses for my kitties - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Iris O.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for windowsill succulents
customer_reviews.text: I had some Sempervivums and a cactus I wanted to put in a small pot and sit on my windowsill for the winter. The size of this planter fits perfectly on my windowsill, and the saucer prevents collects water, preventing damage to the sill. The cactus has even grown a little now that is has more room to grow. The simple design is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: PAS80013

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: A little sad by how small these really are. But we kept them & still put them to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Amiri

customer_reviews.title: Best for both Indoor or outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I use it for mixed my succulents for home decor! The size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joice

customer_reviews.title: Looks Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I put three succulents and some stones in this and it looks so classy and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My succulents are thriving in this planter. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Why is it so hard to find a planter than fits on a window sill? This one fits perfectly on mine and comes with a drip tray. It is stylish, good quality and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the spot I ordert it for. Looks great with the plants in it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: and actually pretty large planter for my succulents
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and actually pretty large planter for my succulents. I have 5 plants in the pot, one large and 4 x-small. Also some miniature fairy garden decorations. My children love it and it matches my kitchen decor. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Clean and simple. Saucer is nice.
customer_reviews.text: We use this outdoors on our patio dining table. It is nice quality and having the saucer keeps water from getting on the table. Clean look and much better than a plastic alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Microbus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the turquoise color & it's absolutely beautiful!! It came in perfect condition & shipping was very quick!! I am extremely pleased!! Recommend 100%..thank you so much for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This planter is absolutely beautiful. Well made and the color is pretty. The seller ships fast. The packaging is safe!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Quality is the best
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, beautiful, exactly what I was looking for my succulents project. It’s perfect I love and I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Yamis amaya

customer_reviews.title: The pot and tray are beautiful. I haven't figured out what the velvet cloth ...
customer_reviews.text: The pot and tray are beautiful. I haven't figured out what the velvet cloth is for. It doesn't exactly match, but it doesn't matter. the pot is beautiful without it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for windowsill
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 of these for succulents and 1 for an herb garden. I can fit all 3 on my kitchen windowsill. I like that there are drainage holes and a tray. The white color is very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: My aloe looks beautiful in this gorgeous planter. It is precisely what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mirren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality Planter
customer_reviews.text: I love this planter! Beautiful quality, perfect size and depth for 3 3.5 inch houseplants, prayer plants (maranta). It's clean, modern, looks great with other sizes and styles of white pots. Looks at home on my hearth. The two drainage holes are each about .75 inch, which is fairly large. Use a piece of landscape fabric, screen fabric, or coffee filter to keep the potting soil in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Saucer too large
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show the saucer aligned pretty closely to the bottom of the planter, but the saucer sticks out much further in the one I received. It looks as though its just sitting on a rectangular plate.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and I am planning on getting another planter ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to plant lemon grass in for my cats. It is sleek and contemporary and adds a touch of style to their eating area. Good quality and I am planning on getting another planter from this company. It got to me quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Great planter pot.
customer_reviews.text: Great planter pot. A little heavy but well, it's made of ceramic :) I like the fact that it has a saucer. I bought my planter pot in the end of April, 2017. So far no cracks and I'm happy. May be I should buy a black one...
customer_reviews.author: SvB

customer_reviews.title: perfect for smaller herbs or for larger succulents
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome planter, perfect for smaller herbs or for larger succulents. It's a thick, glossy ceramic, good for window sills and small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Momo T. Cat

customer_reviews.title: Cute planter
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute planter. I bought it to use on my sink to hold my hand soap & dish soap, scrubbers, etc. it looks great. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic Drainage Potter
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this classic, minimalistic and beautiful piece. I especially like the drainage holes. I used this to plant my succulents in my office however, I am considering taking it home with me. It came packaged nicely and is light but nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter or other use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could hide my dish cleaning items, while also draining my spounge. Fits everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Shallow soil, needs small plants.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but a little too shallow for herbs. Will try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, color is true to photos
customer_reviews.text: Sits nicely on my kitchen windowsill. Fits three 2-2.5in succulents with a bit of room to grow in.
customer_reviews.author: SarahQ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful, spacious planter. It's going to be perfect for my trio of shamrock plants.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarkrider

customer_reviews.title: Nice...for the price? Maybe not...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a plantar for my succulents. This is beautiful and simple. Worked perfectly for what I needed... ....although a little pricey for such a basic item. I didn't return it, although I don't think I will ever repurchase. For $20+, I could have easily gotten several similar plantars.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Creative kitchen caddy
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a caddy next to the kitchen sink. It holds the scrubbers, sponges, drain stoppers, hand soap, and dish soap perfectly. The drainage holes let water drain out and it's really cute.
customer_reviews.author: James Farr

customer_reviews.title: very nice planter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece for my succulents. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Brett Thomas

customer_reviews.title: beauty and style
customer_reviews.text: A perfect holder for my plants (African Violets) Shows off welll and goes with any rrm style. Blends with any room color. oves around easily.
customer_reviews.author: bernardine lacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Accent Piece
customer_reviews.text: Great for my succulents! Very attractive in red. It is on the large side, but I have it on a mantle and it is a nice accent piece. No problems with shipping and handling. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamongirl031

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean lines
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planter and filled it with rocks and succulent soil. Then I bought some fake succulents at Michael's and popped them in. Easy centerpiece! When I'm ready I'll replace with the real succulents because this planter is a great size with drainage holes.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Product is awesome- looks great, clean
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome- looks great, clean, modern in my home. I used it to plant succulents in two window sills. The only reason I ranked it 4 stars is because I ordered two of them and they weren't exactly the same. One was boxier and the other was more rounded. Overall, great product, especially if you're only ordering one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Modern Minimalist Black Planter Box-LOVE IT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty planter box and the quality is excellent! I have planted 3 small cacti in the hopes my 3 cats will leave them alone. This planter goes perfectly in my newly redone kitchen/bar.
customer_reviews.author: TMAC TexasTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not as functional as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful planter. One major deficit with the design is that I like to water my succulents from the bottom - so that the water absorbs up into the roots, but the dish is so shallow, that not only do I have to water from the top only, but I have to be careful that the water doesn't come out and overflow on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dipaola

customer_reviews.title: Super Planter!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out beautifully with my succulents. I love the simple look, but it's nice and heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hill

customer_reviews.title: It has a modern minimalist design and looks good in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I have recently used this container to repot my succulents. It has a modern minimalist design and looks good in my living room. The white color is clean and vibrant. There are drainage holes in the bottom and it has a catch tray, which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: My African violets have seemed much happier since moving to this new pot
customer_reviews.text: My African violets have seemed much happier since moving to this new pot. There is plenty of room for 2 (though it's too tight for 3). This is a great plant pot.
customer_reviews.author: ejr

customer_reviews.title: This planter was perfect for a succulent garden given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This planter was perfect for a succulent garden given as a gift. Beautiful and perfect size for a wide kitchen window frame or as a centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Moeller

product_meta.title: 10 inch Rectangular Modern Minimalist White Ceramic Succulent Planter Pot/Window Box with Saucer
feature_bullets: Bring clean lines and minimalist style to your home decor with this modern ceramic planter box.
Rectangular design, a removable draining tray, and 2 draining holes.
Perfectly displays live potted plants, flowers, or even home decor.
Approximate Dimensions (in inches): Overall - 10.25 W X 4.25 H X 5.25 D; Planter - 10 W X 4 H X 4.75 D; Saucer - 10.25 W X 0.75 H X 5.25 D.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars650 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
